Thaus puab ua lomzem zoo sab hov, puab txawm has tas, “Ca le hu Xaxoo lug dha ua sw rua peb saib.” Puab txhad moog hu Xaxoo tawm huv lub tsev lojfaaj lug, mas Xaxoo kuj lug dha ua sw rua puab saib. Puab kuas nwg sawv huv plawv cov ncej tsev.
Xaxoo has rua tug mivnyuas tub kws tuav nwg teg tas, “Thov coj kuv moog xuas tej ncej kws txheem lub tsev nuav, kuv txhad tau chaw pheeb tej ncej hov.”
Muaj quaspuj quasyawg puv nkaus lub tsev hov. Filixatee cov thawj suavdawg kuj nyob hov ntawd, hab tseed muaj quaspuj quasyawg peb txheeb leej nyob txheej sau saib Xaxoo dha ua sw.

Mas Xaxoo txawm quaj thov Yawmsaub tas, “Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, thov ncu txug kuv. Au Vaajtswv, thov pub zug rua kuv zag nuav tuab zag xwb es kuv yuav pauj taub cov Filixatee rua kuv ob lub qhov muag ib saab.”
Xaxoo txawm tuav ob tug ncej huv plawv tsev kws txheem lub tsev hov hab ntha teg rua ob tug ncej hov, txhais teg xws ntha ib tug txhais teg phem ntha ib tug.

Hab Xaxoo has tas, “Thov ca kuv nrug cov Filixatee tuag lauj.” Tes nwg txawm thawb kawg nkaus nwg tug zug, mas lub tsev hov pob rhe lug tais cov thawj hab cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub tsev txhua tug huvsw. Yog le nuav cov tuabneeg kws nwg tua tuag rua thaus nwg tuag nuav, coob dua le cov kws nwg tua tuag rua thaus nwg tseed muaj txujsa nyob.

Tes nwg cov kwvtij hab nwg tsev tuabneeg suavdawg tuaj coj nwg lub cev tuag moog log rua huv nwg txwv Manau‑a lub qhov ntxaa kws nyob ntawm lub moos Xaula hab lub moos Etha‑oo ntu nruab nraab. Nwg ua thawj kaav cov Yixayee tau neeg nkaum xyoo.
Muaj ib tug yawm yog tuabneeg peg toj sab Efa‑i tebchaws hu ua Mikha.

Nwg has rua nwg nam tas, “Ib txheeb ib puas daim nyaj kws muaj tuabneeg nyag koj le hab koj tau tsawm foom rua hab kuv nov lawd, mas cov nyaj hov nyob ntawm kuv. Yog kuv muab lawm.” Nwg nam txawm has tas, “Thov Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua kuv tug tub.”

Mikha txhad muab ib txheeb ib puas daim nyaj hov thim rua leej nam. Mas leej nam has tas, “Cov nyaj nuav kuv pub hlo rua Yawmsaub ua nwg tug, mas kuv muab rua koj coj moog txaug ua txoov daab hab nchuav ua txoov daab. Kuv txhad muab rov rua koj.”
Thaus Mikha thim cov nyaj rov rua leej nam lawm leej nam txawm coj ob puas daim moog rua tug Kws nyaj muab txaug ua txoov daab hab nchuav ua txoov daab. Mas tej txoov daab hov nyob huv Mikha tsev.
Tug Mikha nuav muaj ib lub tsev daab hab ua ib lub efauj  hab teev daab qhuas, hab tsaa nwg ib tug tub ua pov thawj coj kevcai.
Ncua swjhawm ntawd cov Yixayee tsw muaj vaajntxwv mas txhua tug nyag ua lawv le nyag pum zoo.
Muaj ib tug hluas, yog xeem Levi yog tuabneeg Npelehee, nwg nyob huv Npelehee huv xeem Yuta tebchaws.
Nwg tawm huv Npelehee kws nyob huv Yuta tebchaws moog nrhav chaw nyob. Thaus nwg taug kev moog hov nwg moog txug peg toj sab Efa‑i tebchaws hab moog txug Mikha lub tsev.
Mikha txhad has rua nwg tas, “Koj tuaj hovtwg tuaj?” Nwg teb tas, “Kuv yog ib tug Levi kws nyob huv moos Npelehee huv Yuta tebchaws, kuv tuaj moog nrhav chaw nyob.”

Mikha txawm has rua nwg tas, “Ca le nrug kuv nyob, ua kuv txwv hab ua ib tug pov thawj rua kuv mas ib xyoos kuv yuav muab kaum daim nyaj rua koj hab muab ib cev tsoog tsho hab mov noj rua koj.” Tug Levi hov txhad moog rua huv tsev.
Tug Levi kuj txaus sab nrug tug yawm hov nyob. Tug hluas hov kuj zoo taam Mikha ib tug tub ntaag.
Mikha kuj tsaa tug Levi hov mas tug Levi txhad ua nwg le pov thawj hab nyob huv nwg tsev.
Mikha has tas, “Nwgnuav kuv paub tseeb tas Yawmsaub yuav pub kuv noj qaab nyob zoo tsua qhov kuv muaj ib tug Levi ua pov thawj.”

Ncua swjhawm ntawd cov Yixayee tsw muaj vaajntxwv. Lub swjhawm ntawd xeem Ntaaj saamswm nrhav tebchaws rua puab nyob ua puab qub txeeg qub teg, tsua qhov lug txug thaus hov puab tseed tsw tau nrug cov Yixayee tau qub txeeg qub teg.

Mas cov Ntaaj txhad xaa tswb tug txwvneej kws sab tuab sawv cev puab xeem tuaj huv Xaula hab Etha‑oo moog tshuaj tebchaws hab saib tebchaws. Cov Ntaaj has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le moog tshuaj saib tebchaws.” Puab tuaj txug peg toj sab Efa‑i tebchaws, tuaj txug ntawm Mikha tsev mas su hov ntawd.
Thaus puab tuaj ze ntawm Mikha tsev puab cim tau tug hluas Levi hov lub suab, mas puab txhad nkaag moog nug tas, “Leejtwg coj koj tuaj ntawm nuav hab koj ua daabtsw ntawm nuav? Koj ua num daabtsw?”
Nwg teb puab tas, “Mikha ua le u le nuav rua kuv, nwg ndav kuv mas kuv txhad ua nwg le pov thawj.”
Puab txawm has rua nwg tas, “Thov nug Vaajtswv rua peb sub peb txhad paub tas qhov kws peb yuav moog nuav yuav zoo los tsw zoo.”
Tug pov thawj txawm has rua puab tas, “Ca le tso sab quas lug moog. Yawmsaub lub qhov muag yeej saib ntsoov qhov kws mej moog hov.”

Tswb tug txwvneej hov txhad le tawm moog txug lub moos La‑i, mas pum tas cov tuabneeg huv lub moos hov nyob tso sab quas lug zoo yaam nkaus le cov tuabneeg Xaintoo. Puab nyob tug quas yeeg tsw txob tsw txhawj daabtsw, tsw tu ncua ib yaam daabtsw huv nplajteb nuav le, puab yog tuabneeg muaj txag.  Puab nyob deb ntawm cov Xaintoo hab puab tsw muaj kev ntswg txug lwm yaam tuabneeg.
Thaus puab rov lug txug puab tej kwvtij huv Xaula hab Etha‑oo, mas cov kwvtij nug puab tas, “Mej moog pum zoo le caag?”

Puab teb tas, “Ca le sawv tseeg, peb moog ua rog rua puab tsua qhov peb tub pum lub tebchaws hov lawm yog tebchaws zoo kawg le. Mej yuav tsw ua daabtsw le lov? Tsw xob qeeb qeeb, ca le moog txeeb kag lub tebchaws hov ua mej tug.

Thaus kws mej moog txug yuav ntswb cov tuabneeg kws tsw txob tsw txhawj daabtsw le. Lub tebchaws kuj daav, mas Vaajtswv tub muab rua huv mej txhais teg lawm, yog lub tebchaws kws tsw tu ncua ib yaam daabtsw huv nplajteb nuav.”
Mas xeem Ntaaj rau pua tug txwvneej muaj cuab yeej ua rog tawm huv Xaula hab Etha‑oo moog.

Puab moog ua yeej ntawm Khiliya Ye‑ali huv Yuta tebchaws. Vem le nuav puab txhad hu qhov chaw ntawd has tas Mahane Ntaaj , lug txug naj nub nwgnuav. Lub yeej hov nyob ntawm Khiliya Ye‑ali saab nub poob.
Puab kuj hlaa hov ntawd moog rua peg toj sab Efa‑i tebchaws, moog txug Mikha tsev.

Mas tswb tug txwvneej kws tub moog tshuaj tebchaws ntawm lub moos La‑i lawd has rua puab tej kwvtij tas, “Mej puas paub tas huv lub tsev nuav muaj ib lub efauj  hab daab qhuas hab ib tug txoov daab kws txaug hab ib tug txoov daab kws nchuav? Mej ca le xaav saib mej yuav ua le caag.”
Puab txhad nkaag moog rua huv tug Levi hluas hov lub tsev kws nyob ntawm Mikha tsev mas nug nwg kev noj qaab nyob zoo.
Mas xeem Ntaaj rau pua leej kws coj cuab yeej ua rog sawv ntawm rooj vaag.

Mas tswb tug kws moog tshuaj tebchaws hov kuj nkaag moog muab tug txoov daab kws txaug hab lub tsho efauj hab tej daab qhuas hab tug txoov daab kws nchuav hov. Mas tug pov thawj kuj sawv nrug rau pua tug txwvneej kws coj cuab yeej ua rog sawv ntawm rooj vaag ua ke.

Thaus cov tuabneeg nuav nkaag moog rua huv Mikha tsev muab tug txoov daab kws txaug hab lub tsho efauj hab tej daab qhuas hab tug txoov daab kws nchuav hov lug, tug pov thawj txhad nug tas, “Mej ua daabtsw le nuav?”

Puab teb nwg tas, “Ua tuabywv, muab teg pus qhov ncauj es nrug peb moog, moog ua peb txwv hab ua peb le pov thawj. Ua pov thawj rua ib tug txwvneej tsev tuabneeg zoo los ua pov thawj rua ib xeem ib cum huv cov Yixayee zoo dua?”
Mas tug pov thawj txhad le zoo sab. Nwg txhad muab lub efauj hab tej daab qhuas hab tug txoov daab kws txaug coj nrug cov tuabneeg hov moog.
Puab txhad tig hlo ntawd moog, puab tso puab tej mivnyuas hab tej tsaj txhu moog ua ntej.
Thaus puab moog hov deb ntawm Mikha tsev lawd mas Mikha txawm hu cov tuabneeg kws nyob ze nwg tsev tuaj ua ke mas puab lawv cuag cov tuabneeg Ntaaj.
Puab qw hu cov Ntaaj, mas cov Ntaaj ca le tig has rua Mikha tas, “Muaj le caag es koj yuav coj tuabneeg coob ua luaj le nuav tuaj?”
Nwg teb tas, “Mej muab kuv tej txoov daab kws kuv ua hab coj kuv tug pov thawj tswv moog lawm, es kuv tseed tshuav daabtsw hab? Ua caag mej tseed nug kuv tas, ‘Yog ua le caag?’ ”
Cov Ntaaj txhad has rua nwg tas, “Tsw xob tsaa koj lub suab rua peb nov tsaam tes tej tuabneeg npau tawg tes muab koj hab koj tsev tuabneeg ntaus tuag taag.”
Cov Ntaaj ca le taug kev moog lawm. Thaus Mikha pum tas puab muaj zug dua, nwg ca le tig hlo rov moog tsev lawm.

Cov tuabneeg Ntaaj coj tej kws Mikha ua hab Mikha tug pov thawj moog mas moog txug lub moos La‑i, kws cov tuabneeg nyob sab tug quas yeeg tsw txob tsw txhawj daabtsw le. Puab txawm xuas ntaaj tua cov tuabneeg hov huvsw hab muab puab lub moos hlawv pov tseg taag.

Tsw muaj leejtwg tuaj paab cuam tsua qhov puab nyob deb lub moos Xaintoo hab puab tsw ntswg txug lwm tug. Lub moos La‑i nyob huv lub haav ze lub moos Npelehau. Puab muab lub moos hov ua dua tshab rua puab nyob.
Puab txhad hu lub moos hov hu ua moos Ntaaj lawv le puab yawm koob Ntaaj kws yog Yixayee yug. Yaav thau u lub moos hov hu ua La‑i.

Cov Ntaaj kuj muab tug txoov daab kws txaug txawb rua puab teev. Mas Kawsoo tug tub Yaunathaa kws yog Mauxe  xeeb ntxwv hab nwg cov tub ua pov thawj rua xeem Ntaaj moog txug lub swjhawm kws tebchaws poob.
Puab muab tug txoov daab txaug kws Mikha ua hov txawb teev moog taag lub swjhawm kws Vaajtswv lub tsev nyob huv Silau.
Ncua swjhawm ntawd cov Yixayee tsw muaj vaajntxwv, mas muaj ib tug Levi nyob peg toj sab Efa‑i tebchaws ceg kws deb kawg. Nwg yuav tau ib tug hluas nkauj huv Npelehee huv Yuta tebchaws ua nam yau.
Nwg tug nam yau hov moog deev dua hluas nraug  txhad tswv tug quasyawg rov moog nrug leej txwv nyob huv Npelehee huv Yuta tebchaws, nyob tau plaub lub hlis.

Nwg tug quasyawg tsua moog tog nwg, moog ua tuab zoo has nwg hab yuav coj nwg rov lug. Nwg coj ib tug tub qhe hab ib nkawm neeg luav nrug nwg moog. Tug quaspuj txawm coj tug quasyawg moog rua huv yawm txwv tsev. Thaus yawm txwv pum nwg, kuj zoo sab hlo hu lug tsev.
Nwg yawm txwv kws yog tug ntxhais txwv cheem nwg nyob mas nwg txhad nyob tau peb nub. Puab kuj noj haus hab pw hov ntawd.
Mas nub kws plaub puab txhad sawv ntxuv lug fwbxwm yuav moog, tassws tug ntxhais txwv has rua tug vauv tas, “Ca le noj ib kaug mov txhad muaj zug es kuv sab txhad kheev koj moog.”
Ob tug hov txhad le rov nyob tsawg noj haus ua ke. Mas tug ntxhais txwv cheem tug hov tas, “Rov pw ib mos es thaam kuas zoo sab tsaiv.”
Thaus tug vauv sawv tseeg yuav moog yawm txwv cheem cheem mas nwg rov pw hov ntawd.
Mas nub kws tswb nwg sawv ntxuv yuav moog tassws tug ntxhais txwv has tas, “Noj mov txhad muaj zug, nyob ib chim nub qaij tsaiv.” Ob tug txhad noj mov ua ke.

Thaus tug yawm hov hab nwg tug nam yau hab tug tub qhe sawv tseeg yuav moog, yawm txwv kws yog tug ntxhais txwv has rua nwg tas, “Nub qaij tub yuav tsaus ntuj, tes thov rov nyob ib mos hab. Tub yuav taag ib nub tes pw nuav, ca le zoo sab xyiv faab, mas pigkig mej ca le sawv ntxuv taug kev moog tsev.”

Tassws tug yawm hov tsw yeem pw dua ib mos lawm, nwg ca le sawv tseeg moog lawm. Puab moog txug ncaaj ntawm lub moos Yenpu (kws yog Yeluxalee). Nwg muab ob tug neeg luav pem eeb huvsw hab nwg tug nam yau kuj nrug nwg moog hab.
Thaus puab lug yuav txug lub moos Yenpu mas tub yuav tsaus ntuj, tug tub qhe txhad has rua tug lospaav tas, “Ca peb nkaag moog su rua huv cov Yenpu lub moos nuav hab pw ib mos huv.”
Tug lospaav teb tas, “Peb xob nkaag moog rua huv lwm haiv tuabneeg lub moos kws tsw yog cov Yixayee le, peb yuav hlaa moog kuas txug lub moos Kinpe‑a.”
Nwg txhad has rua tug tub qhe tas, “Ca peb moog kuas ze Kinpe‑a lossws Lama es pw huv tej chaw nuav ib qho.”
Puab txhad hlaa hlo moog. Thaus puab lug ze Kinpe‑a kws yog xeem Npeeyamee lub moos mas nub poob lawm.
Puab txhad nkaag moog yuav pw huv Kinpe‑a. Nwg txhad moog nyob quas tsawg ntawm tshaav puam huv plawv lub moos vem yog tsw muaj leejtwg hu puab moog pw huv tsev.
Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj muaj ib tug yawm laug moog teb lug. Nwg yog tuabneeg peg toj sab Efa‑i tebchaws lug nyob huv lub moos Kinpe‑a, tassws cov tuabneeg huv lub moos hov, yog xeem Npeeyamee.
Nwg tsaa muag saib mas pum cov qhua nyob ntawm tshaav puam huv lub moos, yawm laug hov txhad has tas, “Mej yuav moog hovtwg, hab mej tuaj hovtwg tuaj?”

Tug Levi teb tas, “Peb taug kev huv Npelehee huv Yuta tebchaws lug yuav moog lawm peg toj sab Efa‑i ceg kws deb kawg, yog kuv tuaj peg tuaj, kuv tau moog rua Npelehee huv Yuta tebchaws, kuv yuav rov qaab moog tsev.  Tsw muaj leejtwg hu kuv moog su huv puab tsev.

Quav nyaab hab zaub neeg luav peb kuj muaj txhwj hab peb kws yog koj cov qhev muaj mov noj hab cawv txwv maab txaus rua kuv hab tug puj nuav hab tug hluas kws nrug ib tuaj nuav huvsw, tsw cheem tsum ib yaam daabtsw le.”
Tug yawm laug hov txhad has tas, “Thov ca mej nyob kaaj sab lug. Kuv yuav pub txhua yaam kws mej cheem tsum rua mej. Thov tsw xob pw ib mos ntawm tshaav puam nuav.”
Nwg txhad coj puab lug su huv nwg tsev, nwg muab zaub rua neeg luav noj hab puab ntxuav kwtaw hab noj haus.

Thaus puab saamswm nyob zoo sab hlo mas cov txwvneej phem huv lub moos hov txawm tuaj vej lub tsev tsoo qhov rooj qw hu tug yawm laug kws yog tug tswv tsev hov tas, “Ca le xaa tug yawm kws tuaj rua huv koj tsev tuaj rua peb deev.”
Tug tswv tsev txawm moog has rua puab tas, “Cov kwvtij, tsw xob ua le, tsw xob ua phem le nuav, tsua qhov tug yawm nuav lug su huv kuv tsev lawm. Tsw xob ua phem ua qas le nuav.

Kuv muaj ib tug ntxhais kws tsw tau deev dua hluas nraug le hab muaj nwg tug nam yau nyob nuav, kuv yuav coj tuaj rua mej nwgnuav. Mas mej yuav yuam ob tug hab ua le caag lawv le mej lub sab nyam los tau. Tassws tsw xob ua phem ua qas rua tug txwvneej nuav xwb.”

Tassws cov tuabneeg hov tsw noog hlo le. Mas tug yawm hov txhad muab nwg tug nam yau thawb kag moog rua puab. Cov txwvneej hov txhad le yuam nwg ua phem rua nwg ib mos kaaj ntug. Thaus kaaj ntug txoog puab muab nwg tso moog.
Thaus pum kev tseeb tug quaspuj lug qaug ntawg rua ntawm lub tsev kws tug quasyawg pw taw rooj moog txug nub tawm.
Taagkig tug quasyawg sawv lug qheb qhov rooj yuav moog na cav nwg tug nam yau pw xyaab leeg ntawd ob txhais teg xyaab khaum ntawm paws rooj.
Nwg has rua tug nam yau tas, “Ca le sawv tseeg, peb yuav moog,” kuas tsw nov teb le. Nwg txawm muab tug nam yau tsaws hlo rua sau tug neeg luav, nwg taug kev moog txug ncua tsev.
Thaus nwg moog rua huv tsev lawd nwg ca le muab rag txav tug nam yau kws tuag hov ua kaum ob yaa mas nwg xaa moog thoob plawg Yixayee tebchaws.

Txhua tug kws pum kuj has tas, “Tej xwm zoo le nuav tsw tau muaj dua le txwj thaus cov Yixayee tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug txug nub nua tsw muaj leejtwg txeev pum dua le. Ca le muab coj lug xaav hab sablaaj tuab zoo es has moog.”
Ib tsoom Yixayee txwj nrho Ntaaj moog txug Npe‑awsenpa hab cov huv Kile‑a suavdawg tawm tuaj txoos ua ke ua hlo ib lub sab tuaj rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag huv lub moos Mixapa.
Thaus Vaajtswv cov tuabneeg tuaj sablaaj ua ke mas cov thawj huv txhua xeem Yixayee suavdawg kuj tuaj koom hab. Huvsw muaj 400,000 leej tub rog kws moog kwtaw coj ntaaj.
(Thaus hov cov tuabneeg Npeeyamee nov tas cov Yixayee tuaj ua ke rua Mixapa.) Cov Yixayee has tas, “Thov qha rua peb saib zaaj kev phem nuav tshwm xwm lug le caag.”
Tug Levi kws yog tug nam yau kws raug tua hov tug quasyawg has tas, “Kuv hab kuv tug nam yau lug txug lub moos Kinpe‑a kws yog cov Npeeyamee lub moos, yog peb lug pw ib mos hov ntawd.
Thaus tsaus ntuj cov txwvneej huv lub moos Kinpe‑a txawm tuaj nrhav kuv hab vej nkaus lub tsev. Puab yuav muab kuv tua pov tseg, mas puab muab kuv tug nam yau yuam nwg txhad le tuag.

Kuv coj kuv tug nam yau lub cev tuag moog txav ua tej ywb yaav xaa moog thoob plawg lub tebchaws kws yog cov Yixayee qub txeeg qub teg, tsua qhov puab ua tej kev txaaj muag tej kev qas vuab tsuab rua huv cov Yixayee lawm.
Saib lauj, mej cov tuabneeg Yixayee suavdawg paab sablaaj ntawm nuav saib pum zoo yuav ua le caag.”
Cov pejxeem txhua tug ib txhwj sawv tseeg has tas, “Peb cov nuav tsw muaj ib tug yuav rov qaab moog rua peb tej tsev ntaub hab tsw muaj ib tug yuav moog rua peb vaaj peb tsev.
Peb yuav ua le nuav rua Kinpe‑a. Peb yuav rhu ntawv moog ua rog rua puab.

Peb yuav rhu cov Yixayee txhua xeem ib puas leej rhu kaum leej, ib txheeb leej rhu ib puas, ib vaam leej rhu ib txheeb kuas moog nrhav mov noj lug rua cov tub rog, cov tub rog txhad moog pauj taub tej kev phem kev qas kws cov tuabneeg Kinpe‑a kws yog xeem Npeeyamee ua rua huv cov Yixayee.”
Cov Yixayee suavdawg kuj sau nthwv ua ib lub sab moog ua rog rua lub moos hov.
Txhua xeem Yixayee txhad xaa tuabneeg moog has thoob plawg xeem Npeeyamee tas, “Ua caag yuav muaj tej kev phem kev qas nuav tshwm rua huv mej cov?

Mej ca le muab cov txwvneej phem huv Kinpe‑a rua peb coj moog tua pov tseg mas peb yuav rhuav tshem tej kev phem kuas tawm huv cov Yixayee moog.” Tassws cov Npeeyamee tsw yeem noog puab cov kwvtij Yixayee has.
Cov Npeeyamee txawm tawm huv puab tej moos sau nthwv tuaj rua Kinpe‑a yuav ua rog rua cov Yixayee.
Nub hov cov Npeeyamee txhwj tau cov tub rog coj ntaaj huv puab tej moos huvsw tuaj yog ob vaam rau txheeb leej nrug cov Kinpe‑a kws txhwj tau xyaa pua leej tub rog kws txawj tshaaj plawg.
Cov tub rog huvsw nuav muaj xyaa pua leej kws xws saab txhum phem kws txawj ua rog tshaaj plawg. Cov nuav txhua tug txawj xuas hlua fav pob zeb ntaus kuas raug txuj plaubhau tsw npig le.
Cov Yixayee kws coj ntaaj tsw suav cov Npeeyamee mas txhwj tau 400,000 leej, puavleej yog tub rog sab tuab.
Cov Yixayee txhad moog rua ntawm Npe‑ee moog nug Vaajtswv tas, “Peb cov nuav leejtwg yuav ua ntej moog ntaus cov Npeeyamee?” Yawmsaub has tas, “Ca Yuta moog ua ntej.”
Taagkig cov Yixayee txhad sawv ntxuv moog ua yeej ntaus lub moos Kinpe‑a.
Cov Yixayee tawm moog ua rog rua cov Npeeyamee, hab cov Yixayee npaaj tub rog ua tej paab tej pawg ntaus puab ntawm Kinpe‑a.
Nub hov cov Npeeyamee tawm huv lub moos Kinpe‑a tuaj tua cov Yixayee qaug tuag taag ob vaam ob txheeb leej.
Tassws cov Yixayee tsua sws cuab zug hab rov tso dua tub rog ua tej paab tej pawg rua tej chaw kws tso thawj nub.

Hab cov Yixayee kuj moog quaj rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag ib nub tsaus ntuj. Puab nug Yawmsaub tas, “Peb yuav rov txeem moog ntaus peb cov kwvtij Npeeyamee los tsw xob moog?” Yawmsaub teb tas, “Moog ntaus puab los maj.”
Mas nub kws ob cov Yixayee txhad txeem moog ze ze cov Npeeyamee.
Mas nub ob hov cov Npeeyamee kuj tawm huv Kinpe‑a tuaj tua cov Yixayee tuag taag ib vaam yim txheeb leej, txhua tug puavleej yog tub rog coj ntaaj.

Yixayee cov tub rog suavdawg txhad le moog peg Npe‑ee puab quaj quaj. Puab nyob quas tsawg rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag yoo mov ib nub tsaus ntuj, hab ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo rua Yawmsaub.
Cov Yixayee txhad nug Yawmsaub. (Lub swjhawm ntawd Vaajtswv lub swb xaab sws cog lug nyob hov ntawd.

Mas Ele‑axa tug tub Fineha kws yog Aloo xeeb ntxwv ua num ntawm lub swb xaab rua lub swjhawm hov.) Cov Yixayee nug tas, “Peb yuav rov qaab moog ua rog rua peb cov kwvtij Npeeyamee dua ib zag los peb yuav tso tseg?” Yawmsaub has tas, “Ca le moog ntaus tsua qhov pigkig kuv yuav muab puab rua huv mej txhais teg.”
Yog le nuav cov Yixayee txhad tso tub rog moog nraim cev zuv puag ncig Kinpe‑a.
Mas cov Yixayee txhad rov moog ntaus cov Npeeyamee rua nub kws peb hab tso tub rog ua tej paab tej pawg tiv Kinpe‑a yaam le thawj ob zag.

Cov Npeeyamee tawm tuaj ua rog rua cov Yixayee mas raug ntxag tawm moog deb lub moos. Puab chiv ntaus hab tua cov Yixayee ib txha yaam le thawj ob zag, yog taug txujkev kws moog peg Npe‑ee hab txuj kws moog Kinpe‑a hab tom tej haav xub tsuag, tua tau cov Yixayee kwvlaam peb caug leej.
Cov Npeeyamee has tas, “Puab swb peb yaam le thawj zag lawm.” Tassws cov Yixayee has tas, “Ca peb thim coj puab tawm moog deb lub moos kuas txug tej kev hlub.”
Cov Yixayee suavdawg kuj tawm huv puab tej chaw tswv moog ua tej paab tej pawg ntawm Npa‑aa Thama, mas cov Yixayee kws nraim cev txawm sawv pis tseeg huv puab tej chaw ntawm Kenpa saab nub poob.
Muaj ib vaam tug tub rog Yixayee kws txawj tshaaj plawg txawm txeem moog ntaus lub moos Kinpe‑a. Mas ua rog ceev heev, cov Npeeyamee tsw paub tas kev puam tsuaj tub tuaj ze puab lawm.
Yawmsaub ua rua cov Yixayee kov yeej cov Npeeyamee. Nub hov cov Yixayee tua tau cov Npeeyamee tuag ob vaam tswb txheeb ib puas leej, cov hov puavleej yog tub rog tuav ntaaj.
Yog le hov cov Npeeyamee txhad pum tas puab swb lawm. Cov Yixayee thim tswv cov Npeeyamee vem yog puab tso sab rua cov kws nraim cev kws puab tso moog zuv lub moos Kinpe‑a.
Cov kws nraim cev zuv kuj sawv pis tseeg txeem moog ntaus lub moos Kinpe‑a. Cov kws nraim cev hov tawm lug xuas ntaaj tua lub moos huvsw.
Cov Yixayee nrug cov kws nraim cev teem hum tas thaus puab ua paa tawg nchu hlub huv lub moos,
mas cov Yixayee yuav tig rov lug tua. Cov Npeeyamee chiv tua tau cov Yixayee kwvlaam peb caug leej tes txawm has tas, “Puab yuav tuag rua peb teg ib yaam le thawj zag hab ntaag.”
Tassws thaus muaj paa tawg nchu tshwm plawg huv lub moos lawv le kws teem ca hov, cov Npeeyamee tig lug saib na cav lub moos tub cig paa nchu nto ntuj lawm.
Cov Yixayee tig loo rov lug, mas cov Npeeyamee kuj poob sab tsua qhov puab pum tas kev puam tsuaj lug txug puab lawm.
Puab txhad tig hlo tswv cov Yixayee taug txujkev kws moog rua tebchaws moj saab qhua, tassws puab tswv tsw dim kev ua rog, mas cov Yixayee kws tawm huv tej moos  tuaj kuj muab puab tua rua huv plawv.
Puab muab cov Npeeyamee puav kev hab lawv tua moog rua ntawm tej chaw kws cov Npeeyamee su, moog ncaaj lub moos Kinpe‑a saab nub tuaj.
Cov Npeeyamee tuag ib vaam yim txheeb leej, puavleej yog cov tub rog kws sab luj sab tuab.

Puab kuj tig tswv moog rua tebchaws moj saab qhua moog txug lub pob tsuas Limoo. Cov Yixayee tua puab tuag taug txujkev tswb txheeb leej hab lawv ceev puab moog txug ncua Kintoo mas tua tau ob txheeb leej.
Npeeyamee cov tub rog sab luj sab tuab kws coj ntaaj raug tuag taag rua nub hov huvsw yog ob vaam tswb txheeb leej.
Tassws muaj rau pua leej tub rog tig tswv moog rua tebchaws moj saab qhua moog txug lub pob tsuas Limoo, mas puab nyob ntawm lub pob tsuas Limoo tau plaub lub hlis.
Cov Yixayee kuj rov moog ntaus cov Npeeyamee hab xuas ntaaj tua tej tuabneeg hab tej tsaj txhu hab txhua yaam kws puab pum. Hab txhua lub moos kws puab moog txug puab muab hlawv huvsw pov tseg.
Cov Yixayee tau cog lug twv ntawm Mixapa tas, “Peb cov tsw kheev leejtwg muab tej ntxhais qua rua cov Npeeyamee.”
Cov pejxeem kuj tuaj rua ntawm Npe‑ee nyob ntawm Vaajtswv xubndag ib nub tsaus ntuj puab tsaa suab quaj heev kawg le.
Puab has tas, “Au Yawmsaub kws yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv, ua caag muaj tej xwm zoo le nuav tshwm lug rua huv cov Yixayee es nub nua yuav pluj plag ib xeem Yixayee lawm?”
Taagkig tom qaab cov pejxeem sawv ntxuv ua ib lub thaaj hab ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo.

Mas cov Yixayee has tas, “Cov xeem Yixayee leejtwg tsw tuaj sablaaj rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag nev?” Cov Yixayee tub cog lug twv tawv kawg le has txug tug kws tsw tuaj sablaaj rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag huv Mixapa tas, “Tug hov yuav tsum raug muab tua xwb.”
Cov Yixayee khuvleej puab tug kwv Npeeyamee puab has tas, “Nub nua ib lub xeem huv cov Yixayee raug muab txav pov tseg lawm.

Peb yuav ua le caag nrhav quaspuj rua cov Npeeyamee kws tseed tshuav nyob, tsua qhov peb tub tuav Yawmsaub lub npe cog lug twv lawm tas peb yuav tsw muab peb tej ntxhais qua rua puab yuav ua quaspuj?”
Mas puab has tas, “Tshuav xeem twg huv cov Yixayee kws tsw tuaj rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag huv Mixapa?” Yeej tsw muaj ib tug tuaj ntawm Yanpe Kile‑a tuaj nrug puab koom huv lub yeej.
Tsua qhov thaus puab txheeb cov pejxeem yeej tsw pum muaj cov Yanpe Kile‑a ib tug nyob ntawd hlo le.

Ua le hov cov pejxeem txhad tso cov tub rog kws sab luj sab tuab ib vaam ob txheeb leej moog rua Yanpe Kile‑a mas has rua puab tas, “Xuas ntaaj tua cov kws nyob huv Yanpe Kile‑a hab tua cov quaspuj hab cov mivnyuas yau.
Mej yuav tsum ua le nuav, txhua tug txwvneej hab txhua tug quaspuj kws tub nrug dua txwvneej pw lawm mas muab tua pov tseg huvsw.”
Huv cov tuabneeg Yanpe Kile‑a hov puab pum muaj plaub puas tug nkauj xwb kws tsw tau nrug txwvneej pw le, puab txhad coj cov nkauj xwb hov lug rua lub yeej ntawm Silau huv Khana‑aa tebchaws.
Cov pejxeem suavdawg kuj xaa xuv moog rua cov Npeeyamee kws nyob ntawm lub pob tsuas Limoo hab tshaaj xuv rua puab tas rov sws raug zoo lawm.
Thaus hov cov Npeeyamee txhad rov lug, mas cov Yixayee muab cov nkauj xwb kws puab tseg txujsa huv Yanpe Kile‑a rua puab yuav, tassws tsw txaus.
Mas cov pejxeem khuvleej cov Npeeyamee tsua qhov Yawmsaub ua rua cov Yixayee ndais ib xeem lawm.
Mas cov kev txwj quas laug huv cov pejxeem txhad has tas, “Vem cov Npeeyamee tej quaspuj raug puam tsuaj taag lawm peb yuav ua le caag nrhav quaspuj rua cov kws tsw tau txhua?”
Puab has tas, “Cov Npeeyamee kws tseed tshuav yuav tsum muaj caaj muaj ceg nyob sub txhad le tsw muaj ib xeem huv cov Yixayee raug muab ntxuav kuas tu noob.

Tassws peb muab tsw tau peb tej ntxhais qua rua puab yuav tsua qhov cov Yixayee tau cog lug twv tas, ‘Yog leejtwg muab tug ntxhais qua rua cov Npeeyamee yuav ua quaspuj mas tug hov yuav raug lu lug foom tsw zoo.’ ”

Puab txhad has tas, “Txhua xyoo muaj kevcai paam noj haus xyeem rua Yawmsaub ntawm Silau, kws nyob ntawm Npe‑ee saab peg, yog ntawm txujkev moog Npe‑ee rua Sekhee saab nub tuaj hab nyob ntawm lub moos Lenpauna saab nraag.”
Puab txhad has rua cov Npeeyamee tas, “Moog tswv nraim rua huv tej vaaj txwv maab zuv tog,

mas saib, yog cov ntxhais huv Silau tuaj nrug luas dha seev cev, mej ca le tawm plawg huv tej vaaj txwv maab lug nqug cov ntxhais huv Silau ib leeg ib tug coj moog ua quaspuj mas rov qaab moog rua Npeeyamee tebchaws.

Thaus tej ntxhais hov leej txwv lossws tej kwvtij tuaj ywg rua peb mas peb yuav has rua puab tas, ‘Thov saib rua peb es ca puab yuav, tsua qhov thaus peb moog ua rog peb muab tsw tau quaspuj txaus rua puab txhua tug, hab mej los mej kuj tsw muab rua puab, yog mej muab los mej kuj txhum.’ ”
